sourcesContent: import React, {useState} from 'react' import {FilterHeaderContainer, Title, FilterOptionsContainer, FilterOption, FilterIcon, SortDropdownContainer } from './filter-header.styles' const FilterHeader = ({title, isOpen, handleClick, setIsOpen}) => { const [toggleDropdown, setToggleDropdown] = useState(false); return ( {title} setIsOpen(!isOpen)}> {isOpen ? 'Show' : 'Hide'} Filters setToggleDropdown(!toggleDropdown)} toggleDropdown = {toggleDropdown}> Sort By Price: High-Low Price: Low-High ) } export default FilterHeader
